1187:1011: abhisandhāya tathāgatena asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā āryaśrāvakā iti deśitam,
1187:1025: bhāvagrahaṇābhāvena tadabhāvarūpatve sati bhāvagrāha eva tāvat prasajyate|
1187:1026: ata eva āryasandhinirmocanasūtre uktam - 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro'rthaḥ' iti|
1187:1032: ataḥ abhāvarūpatvena dharmeṣu sattvādatattvameva svabhāvena tat|
1187:1036: ata eva teṣu āryasandhinirmocanādiṣu- ' na tattvasya bhāvāditaro'rthaḥ ' ityuktam|
1187:1037: ata eva na dharmo nādharmaḥ ityuvāca|
1187:1042: yadi bhagavato'bhisambodhirvā dharmadeśanā vā nāsti kaściod dharmaḥ,
1187:1043: kathaṃ tarhi bodhisattvena puṇyahetudharmakāyaṃ prāptukāmena saddharmaparigrahe'nupravartitavyamiti vicintya puṇyahetudharmakayakāmatācchandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityuktam|
1187:1048: tato nidānam iti ratnadānānāṃ nidānāt tataḥ puṇyodbhavaḥ,
1187:1062: prajñaptisattvāt skandhānāṃ na puṇyaskandho bhāvarūpeṇa sambhavati|
1187:1064: bhāvānāṃ sthiratvena abhisaṃskāreṇa apravṛttatvāt cittamapi prajñaptisanmātrameva|
1187:1065: ekānekasvabhāvena pratisvaṃ parīkṣāyāṃ mithyaiva tāvat svabhāvaḥ|
1187:1066: ata eva na puṇyaskandhaḥ paramārthato vidyate|
1187:1079: tena ca bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti āvedituṃ bhagavatā yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyuktam|
1187:1080: anena tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukādhigamakāyasya pravacanakāyato nirjātatvāt tataścatuṣpādikāyāmapi gāthāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ (yadā)
1187:1082: tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukadharmakāyasya tu kathaiva keti nirdiśyate|
1187:1085: etena paramārthataḥ dharmadeśanāyāḥ abhisambuddhasya cāpyasattve saṃvṛtau tāvat puṇyakāyadeśanāyāḥ sattvāt bodhisattvaiḥ puṇyamadhigāntuṃ pravartayitavyamevetyabhiprāyaḥ|
1187:1088: ṣaṭpādikāyā gāthāyāḥ sattve'pi catuṣpādikā iti viśeṣīkṛtā|
1187:1098: kimiti śraddheyamātramuta yuktito'vagamyamiti manasi kṛtvā tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:1099: iti pṛcchāyām ato nirjātā hi subhūte,
1187:1101: evaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyam iti tacca bṛhatphalatvāttat bahutaraṃ puṇyam,
1187:1103: ratnanirjātaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ tu mahāparibhogādi gauṇasāaṃsārikaṃ phalaṃ prāpayati|
1187:1106: dharmadānena tāvadakṣayāpratimatathāgatapadaprāpteḥ tanmahattvaṃ kimiti na prasaktam ?
1187:1107: yathā dharmeṇānugraho na tathā ratnaiḥ pareṣāmanugrahaḥ|
1187:1108: tathā hi parebhyaḥ samprakāśitena kramaśo'nena dharmeṇa kṣiprameva buddhatvapadaṃ labhyate,
1187:1110: ata eva parebhyaḥ parānugrāhakatvād ratnadānād dharmadānaṃ viśiṣṭamityābhisandhiḥ|
1187:1113: tāni tāvad daśa caritāni- lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ dānaṃ vācanaṃ śravaṇam udgrahaṇam samprakāśanaṃ svādhyāyaḥ cintanaṃ bhāvanā ceti|
1187:1114: ato nirjātāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti saṃvṛtau etānyāśritya buddhāḥ prajñaptā iti vākyaśeṣaḥ paramārthatastu bodhiḥ buddhaśca bhinnau na staḥ|
1187:1115: anena tāvat puṇyasya paramavaiśiṣṭayaparidīpanena tadutpādayituṃ chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam|
1187:1116: yadi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpāda eva tadā sarve buddhadharmā apyanutpannā eva bhaveyuḥ tatkatham ato nirjātā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti ?
1187:1117: na buddhānāṃ bodherbhinnatvamiti vicārya tatkasya heto ?
1187:1120: buddhaprajñaptihetukā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhilakṣaṇā dharmā eva hi buddhadharmāḥ|
1187:1122: apitu prajñaptihetutvād ato nirjātā buddhaḥ ityuktamityabhiprāyaḥ|
1187:1124: saṃvṛtimāśritya tathāgatānāmanusamyaksaṃbodhistu ato nirjātā ityādinā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
1187:1126: ata eva tattaditarapakṣebhyaḥ buddhadharmā iti paramārthato naiva vaktuṃ śakyate|
1187:1129: atra kecidāhuḥ kathaṃ tridhā bhinno'yaṃ dharmakāyaḥ|
1187:1131: prajñaptyā ca pravacanasvabhāvo dharmakāya iti ced ?
1187:1132: tathā sati rūpakāyo'pi tatprāpteranurūpahetutvāt tatprāpakahetutvācca dharmakāyaḥ syāditi|
1187:1134: bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ dharmakāyastu pariśuddhajñānasvabhāvastathā yā ca tasya sāmānyadharmatā,
1187:1137: na cātra pravacanapuṇyayorupacāreṇa dharmaḥ iti deśanā'pi|
1187:1141: svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmā iti yat vyākhyātaṃ tat sarvadharmasādhāraṇamiti na rūpakāyastathāgatatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ,
1187:1143: prajñaptita ityucyamāne'pi na rūpakāyo dharmakāyatvena prasakto bhavati,
1187:1145: buddhānāṃ rūpikāyo hi puṇyaṃ sambhṛtya jāyate|
1187:1150: sambhāralakṣaṇapuṇyanicayasyāpi tatprāptihetutvāt prajñaptyā dharmakāya ityucyamāno'pi yujyata eveti alamadhikena|
1187:1151: anyat kucodyaṃ yuktamayuktaṃ veti vicakṣaṇairviveciyiṣyata iti matvā padabāhulyabhiyā na likhyate|
1187:1153: itaḥ paraṃ dvādaśavipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣāṇi dvādaśasthānāni yathākramaṃ veditavyāni|
1187:1168: tatra bhagavatā dharmapudgalayorvistareṇa nairātmye deśite'pi anādikālīnadṛḍhātmābhiniveśasañcayabalena yadi kaścidevaṃ manyeta- yasya sattvādisaṃjñā pravartate,
1187:1170: evaṃ tarhi yaduktaṃ bhagavatā 'tasmin kāle'haṃ vīradatto nāma nṛpo'bhavam,
1187:1171: ' yuṣmabhyaṃ mayā dharmo deśayiṣyate ityādi kathaṃ syāt|
1187:1172: (ataḥ) sattvasaṃjñādivirahasya naivamabhiprāya iti vighnabhūtābhimānavisaṃyogārthaṃ pañcamasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi|
1187:1173: asyāyamatra sāmānyato'rthaḥ- ye mama mṛduśrāvakāḥ srotaāpannatvādiṣu dharmanairātmyānadhigamād aprāptarasānubhavāḥ,
1187:1174: teṣāmapi ahantvena mamatvena cābhiniveśo na bhavati,
1187:1176: tasmin kāle'ham..... ityādi yattallokena saha vyavahāraprajñaptyarthaṃ parasantānavyavacchedamātrajñāpanārthaṃ vā,
1187:1179: tattvajñānasthitaiḥ na śakyate tāvallokena saha vyavahartum|
1187:1184: tasya ca kartari karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ cābhiniveśaprahāṇena idampratyayatādhigamānnairātmyādhigamo darśitaḥ|
1187:1188: ityanena tāvadarthataḥ mayā prāptamiti vipakṣatvena paridītyate|
1187:1189: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā prāptam ityanena apalakṣaṇamātrapradarśanena sarveṣāmabhimānānāṃ praheyatvaṃ pradarśaye|
1187:1191: āryasubhūtirapi bhagavato'bhiprāyaṃ nirdiśan paramārthasthāpannārthaṃ tatra yogasamāpattiṃ ca grahītuṃ na hi sa bhagavan kañcid (dharmaṃ)
1187:1202: sthiterabhāvāt kenāpi kathamapi tanna prāptuṃ śakyate|
1187:1203: yasmin santāne nairātmyamārgalakṣaṇahetusannihitatayā kleśamutpādātyantaviruddhāśrayalakṣaṇaṃ phalamutpadyata iti phalaṃ prāptyata ityevamucyate,
1187:1205: api ca, prāpyaprāpakabhāvaḥ khalu bhinnakālikaḥ samakāliko vā syāt|
1187:1206: tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ dvayorapi sthitatvāt,
1187:1220: idaṃ prāpyamidañca prāpakamiti niścayo na bhavatī|
1187:1222: teṣāṃ sarvātmanā saṃyoge sati ekatvaṃ prasajyate,
1187:1225: nairantaryeṇāvasthāne'pi na bhavituṃ śaknoti ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt|
1187:1232: śeṣeṇa rūpādinā ca dharmāyatanaikadeśena ca saṃskṛtā nirdiśyante|
1187:1237: yadi mayā prāptamityabhiniveśastadā kathaṃ nocyeta srota āpanna iti vicintya saced bhagavan ityādyāha|
1187:1241: sa pṛthagjana iti kathaṃ syāt srota-āpanna ityabhisandhiḥ|
1187:1246: amumevārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntāntare prapañcya nirdeṣṭuṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ ityādyāha|
1187:1254: na hi sa kaścid dharmo yo'rhannāma prahīṇatathāvidhakleśāvaraṇajñānasantatau upacaritatvāt,
1187:1255: santateśca prajñaptau sattvānna sa kaścana paramārthataḥ,
1187:1257: sāmpratam āryasubhūtiḥ 'ahaṃ' padaprayojyamātmānamadhikṛtya viśiṣṭatvena araṇāvihārīti sādhāraṇaguṇatvena arhanniti ca 'ahamasmi' ityanenoktvā cittapragrahamātraṃ darśayituṃ aham ityādyavocat|
1187:1259: atra cobhatobhāgavimuktatvamarhattvamālambya taditareṣu raṇā notpādyanta iti vicintya yogaḥ samāpadyate|
1187:1260: tato vyutthāya tamālambya taditareṣu nopajāyante raṇāḥ|
1187:1263: na māṃ vyākariṣyat iti tadā aprahīṇatvādātmadṛṣṭermayā srota-āpattiphalamapi durlabham,
1187:1265: kathamaraṇāyāṃ vihartavyamiti cintāyāṃ na kvacid viharati ityavocat|
1187:1266: prāptaṃ mayā kiñcat saṃkṛtamaṃskṛtaṃ vetyevamabhiniveśena yo'sthitaḥ,
1187:1269: adhunā ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ|
1187:1270: ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ iti nātmābhiniveśena,
1187:1275: nanvasati kasmiṃścidapi prāpye prāpake vā paramārthataḥ,
1187:1276: bodhisattvabhūtena bhagavatā kathaṃ tathāgatadīpaṅkarasyāntikād dharma udgṛhītaḥ ?
1187:1278: tadā'smābhirdharmamudgrahītukāmaiḥ kathamārādhanīstathāgatotpāda iti ye parikalpayanti teṣāmalpaśrutatvapratibandhāpākaraṇārtha ṣaṣṭhaṃ sthānamadhikṛtyāha- asti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṅkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ ? iti |
1187:1279: subhūtirapi prāgevābhiprāyaṃ viditvā no hīdam ityavocat|
1187:1280: nāsti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasya prāpyaprāpakatvena udgrahaṇaṃ nāma,
1187:1282: 'sarve dharmāḥ prakṛtyā śāntāḥ' tathāpi tathāgatānubhāvena nānāpadasamudāyādīnāṃ jñānāvabhāsotpādamatre udgṛhītaḥ ityupacaryate,
1187:1284: anenārthataḥ 'bodhisattvena śrutaparyeṣaṇakāle buddhotpāda ārādhanīyastadanantaraṃ buddhadharmā udgṛhītavyāḥ ' ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ|
1187:1288: 'nāsti sa kaścid dharma udgṛhītaḥ ' ityanena paramārthataḥ dharmāṇāmagrāhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpya tatra yogasamāpattiḥ vikṣepanigrahaśca nirdiṣṭau|
1187:1291: yadi paramārthataḥ karmakartrādayo na syustadā kathaṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ praṇidadhatīti tarkayatāṃ teṣāṃ hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāvibandhasaṃyogārthaṃ saptamasthānamadhikṛtyāha- yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvaḥ iti|
1187:1294: bhagavān bodhisattvānāṃ tattatkṣetrapariśuddhisampadaṃ kathamuktavāniti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:1297: avyūhāste iti paramāṇubhirābdho'vayavibhūto vā nāsti kaścid vyūhaḥ paramārthata ityavyūhā eva te,
1187:1298: tathāpi svapnopalabdhakṣetravyūhavad avicāraramaṇīyamātra saṃvṛtisattvamuktaṃ tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ iti|
1187:1301: evāṃ muṣitasmṛtikānāmupakārāya upasaṃhāropayena smārayituṃ tasmād ityādyāha|
1187:1303: kasyacidapi vastunaḥ siddherabhāvāt tatra 'apratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam' ityarthaḥ|
1187:1305: tatra vitathaṃ vadet ityanenārthataḥ paramārthataḥ mayā kṣetravyūho niṣpādyata ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena paridīpitaḥ|
1187:1307: hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāṃ prati chandaḥ praṇidhānamapi [ na karttavyamityapi ] nirdiṣṭam|
1187:1308: avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ityanena paramārthavyavasthāpanena yogasamāpattau pravṛttiḥ gambhīratā ca nirdiśyete|
1187:1309: tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
1187:1312: skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvenāsattve'pi kiṃ nābhinnā eva sattvāḥ ?
1187:1315: tasmāt sattvopekṣālakṣaṇavighnabhūtād visaṃyogārtham aṣṭamasthānamadhikṛtya tadyathāpi nāma ityuktam|
1187:1319: kimarthaṃ deśitaṃ bhagavatetyabhiprāyaṃ vaktukāmanayā tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:1321: tameva abhiprāyaṃ vaktumāha- na bhāvaḥ iti|
1187:1323: svapnadṛṣṭa iva sa ātmabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ proktastathāgatena,
1187:1328: anyathā paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasyāsiddhatvāt tathā nocyetetyabhiprāyaḥ|
1187:1329: abhāvaṃ tāvad bhāvatvenābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāṃ jaiminyādīnāṃ pratiṣedhārtham na sa bhāvaḥ ityāha|
1187:1330: abhāvasya tu bhāvavyatirekeṇa sthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ tadviparītasvabhāvo na syāt ?
1187:1333: tato'yamabhāvatvena deśitaḥ sumerumātraparimāṇo'pi ya ātmabhāvo yadā niḥsvabhāvatvāt paramārthato nāsti,
1187:1334: tadā kathaṃ parātmabhāvaḥ sasvabhāvaḥ sātmako vā bhavet ?
1187:1335: atrārthataḥ sattvaparipākāyodyamaratānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvābhiniveśaḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣatvena pradarśitaḥ tatprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe|
1187:1336: ' puruṣaḥ ' ityupalakṣaṇamātrābhidhānena aṇḍajādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ pṛthagātmabhāvānāṃ parigrahaṇamuktam|
1187:1337: na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityanena tāvat paramārthaṃ vyasthāpya yogasamāpattisthānaṃ gambhīratvaṃ ca paridīpite|
1187:1338: na sa bhāvaḥ ityanena tu vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ|
1187:1340: sampratyasya dharmaparyāyasya mahārthatvapratipādanena bāhyaśāstreṣvabhiniviṣṭānāṃ tatrānunayavikṣepaparihārārthaṃ navamasthānamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase sūbhūte ityāha|
1187:1341: anena tāvat caturbhiḥ prakārairasya dharmaparyāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaṃ paridīpyatepuṇyaparigrahaḥ,
1187:1345: tatra puṇyaparigrahastu yadāha tato nidānaṃ bahupuṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt iti|
1187:1346: devādibhiḥ satkārastu yadāha sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ caityabhūtyabhūto bhaved iti|
1187:1347: duṣkarakṛtyavidhānaṃ tu yadāha parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti iti|
1187:1348: tathāgatāditulyatākaraṇaṃ tu yadāha tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ iti|
1187:1349: tatra ratnadānasya puṇyābhidhānaṃ viśeṣadvayena viśiṣṭaṃ paridīpitamvastuviśeṣaḥ kṣetraviśeṣaśca|
1187:1353: praṇītastu loke dūrlabhatvena khyātaḥ yadāha saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā iti|
1187:1357: yathā vastutathatā tathā bhāṣitatvāt niruktyā tathā ukta iti kathyate|
1187:1365: tatra pūrvaṃ tāvat parasya phalam athavā aparaṃ tu pūrvasya vyākhyānam|
1187:1366: deśayet iti śabdaṃ samprakāśayet iti chandam adhimuktimutpādayedityarthaḥ|
1187:1371: athavā ' bhāṣyeta ' iti padam ' samprakāśyeta ' ityartham |
1187:1374: yadaivaṃ pudgalanairātmyagāthāmātropadeśenāpi caityabhūtyabhūto jāyate kiṃ khalu punaḥ nairātmyadvayopadeśena ityabhiprāyaḥ|
1187:1377: vācayiṣyanti iti pustakagatam paryavāpsyanti iti artham|
1187:1379: cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā codgṛhītatvād yoniśaśca (manasi kariṣyanti) ityāha|
1187:1386: sa eva sākṣād dharamāṇabuddha iveti vākyaśeṣaḥ|
1187:1387: guru iti mañjughoṣādyanyataraḥ kaścit tatkāryasādhanāya dharmabhāṇakaḥ sthānīyarūpeṇa draṣṭavyaḥ|
1187:1394: tasminnanurāgaṃ parityajya dharmaṃ pratipattuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca darśite|
1187:1395: ito dharmaparyāyād ityupalakṣaṇamātraparikīrtanena bāhyaśāstreṣvanurāgaṃ parivarjya sarvasaddharmān prati yatna āstheya iti paridīpitam|
1187:1396: acintyasāmarthyanvitatvādayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ nāmamātraśravaṇenāpi parānupakarotīti sattvānāṃ puṇyotpādakathanāya āryasubhūtiḥ ko nāma ayam iti pṛṣṭavān|
1187:1397: kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi ityanena asyodgrahaṇenāpyaprameyapuṇyaṃ bhavatīti paridīpyate|
1187:1398: prajñāpāramitā nāma iti yasyā tannāma tattathā ucyate|
1187:1401: prajñā ca sā pāramitā ceti samāsaḥ|
1187:1404: sā cārthataḥ sarvavidhaprajñāsu uttamā tāthāgatī prajñā nānyadā prajñayā pāraṃ parimāpayituṃ śakyam|
1187:1411: tasyāśca bhagavatāḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataścānutpannatvāt sā śabdenābhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityāśayena vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:1415: paramārthataḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataśca sarvadharmāṇām atyantānutpannatvāt ca sā na śabdenābhidheyā,
1187:1419: tasmāt vikalpapratibimbabhūtā yā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena deśitā,
1187:1424: tato bhrāntapratīteḥ sa vikalpapratibimbo naiva bhedenāvagamyate,
1187:1425: ato jñānasvabhāvatvena saiva paramārthaprajñā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityucyate|
1187:1427: athavā yā tāthāgatī prajñā pratītirūpatvena tathāgatena bhāṣitā saiva paramārthato na vidyate,
1187:1429: eva iti śabdastu apāramitā ityetadanantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ|
1187:1430: anena paramārthatvaṃ pratipādya tatra yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti nirdiṣṭam|
1187:1431: yathā prajñāpāramitā vikalpapratibimbātmikaiva bāhyatvena samāropya bhagavatā bhāṣitā ,
1187:1432: tathaiva sarve dharmā api nānyathā tathāgatena kathitā iti deśanārthamāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte iti|
1187:1437: ata eva ca paramārthataḥ ' nāsti kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ' iti vijñāya sthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ no hīdaṃ bhagavan,
1187:1438: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityavocat|
1187:1439: anena vikṣepanigrahaḥ gāmbhīryaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe bhavataḥ|
1187:1442: tathāpi ye tāvad ādikarmikāḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmeṣu nairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti cintayanti,
1187:1444: atra dvividhena upāyena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti darśyate|
1187:1446: tatra yāvat pṛthivīrajo bhavet ityanena ekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt tanūkaraṇopāyo nirdiśyate|
1187:1450: ata eva paramāṇuvibhāvanāyāṃ sattyāmekatvaṃ prahīyata eveti|
1187:1453: te ca paramāṇavo'pi yadi digbhāgabhedena bhinnatvādasiddhā eva syuḥ, (tarhiṃ)
1187:1458: bahu tat pṛthivīrajo'pi yaḥ paramāṇusvabhāva uktastadekatvagrahaṇaniṣedhāt tadaraja eva|
1187:1465: anyathā paramārthastasyāsattvād anabhilāpyatvācca svalakṣaṇaṃ nābhilapyata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ|
1187:1469: evañcāntaśaḥ paramāṇūnāmapi yuktyā pratyekaṃ parikṣyamāṇānāṃ pratītāveva sattvāt pratīyate lokadhātūnāṃ cānekasvaviyuktatvam,
1187:1472: evaṃ khalu bhājanalokasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena niḥsvabhāvatvamṝ evamabhidhāya sattvalokasyāpyabhidhānārtha yo'sau lokadhātuḥ ityāha|
1187:1475: adhātuḥ saḥ iti ekānekasvabhāvarahitaḥ sa ityabhiprāyaḥ|
1187:1476: evaṃ yo hi rūpaskandhaḥ sa bhājanalokatvenābhihitaḥ,
1187:1477: śeṣāścatvāraḥ skandhāstu yathaikānekasvabhāvena viyuktāstathā pūrvaṃ vivecitā eva|
1187:1478: evaṃ sati paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarve dharmā māyopamā dṛśyante yogibhiḥ|
1187:1481: tatprahāṇārthaṃ ca chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe|
1187:1482: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau iti nimittamātrābhidhānena sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvabhāvanā sandarśitā|
1187:1483: arajastat iti adhātuḥ ityābhyāṃ paramārthavyavasthāpanayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti tat paridīpitam|
1187:1484: tenocyate lokadhātuḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ|
1187:1486: samprati ye bodhisattvāḥ puṇyasambhārapratipattaye'tyantamupakāritvād bhagavantaṃ pūjayeyusteṣāṃ tasya (bhagavataḥ)
1187:1489: tasmāt teṣāṃ sambhārāsañcayato viyogārthaṃ ekādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi|
1187:1498: atrārthataḥ rūpakāye tathāgatābhiniveśaṃ vipakṣatvena nirdiśya tatprahānārthaṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi pradarśite|
1187:1503: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyāvagamopāye nirdiṣṭe'pi kāyajīviteṣvāsajya ye lābhasatkārādhyasitāḥ kausīdyalābhasatkārapiṇḍapātānuraktā teṣāṃ tatrānuraktivisaṃyogārthaṃ dvādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- yaśca khalu punaḥ sūbhūte,
1187:1505: anena cāsāre'nekaśatasahasraduḥkhaikasthānatucchātmabhāve tasmin snihyan etāvacchariraparityāgenāpi yatpuṇyaṃ na prāptam,
1187:1509: tatprahāṇāya saddharmasamādānāya ca chandaḥ praṇidhānañcāpi nirdiṣṭe|
1187:1513: āryasubhūtiḥ aśrūṇi prāmuñcat tadapi bhagavato'dhiṣṭhānenānyeṣu kusīdeṣu janeṣu adbhutamahāyānadharmasyābhidhānena paramaśraddhotpādārthe draṣṭavyam|
1187:1514: tasmād hastena aśrūṇi pramṛjya bhagavantametadavocat āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
1187:1519: yataḥ ityāryasatyagocarajñānotpādamārabhya etatparyantaṃ dharmaparyāyasya paramapuṇyaphalasya yathoktā deśanā śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhanāmagocarā naivaṃ śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ| etena-
1187:1521: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā yeṣāṃ vīryamārabhya pravṛttānāmasmin dharme yathārutasaṃjñā bhavati teṣāṃ taddoṣaparijihīrṣayā parameṇāścaryeṇa ityavocat|
1187:1532: asatsu ca saṃjñeyeṣu saṃjñāyā apyabhāvaḥ prasajyeta,
1187:1533: tasmāt kathaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sidhyedityupālambhaṃ vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityavocat|
1187:1539: ata eva nocyate bhūtasaṃjñeyaṃ bhūtasaṃjñātveneti darśitam,
1187:1540: yato hyavicāraramaṇīyamātrataḥ vidyate tasmāt tāṃ tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā,
1187:1543: kathaṃ ca vikṣepo nigrahītavya ityubhayaṃ darśitaṃ gāmbhīryañcāpi nigaditam,
1187:1550: samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ ye imaṃ bhagavan,
1187:1555: atrāyaṃ sāmānyena samāsārthaḥ - anāgate saddharmavipralopakāle ye bodhisattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
1187:1557: mayyapyevaṃ sambhāvanāyāṃ saddharmotthānakāle'pi yuṣmākametādṛśapratipattyabhāve idamatyantaṃ lajjāsthānaṃ tat syādityucyate|
1187:1560: bhāṣyamāṇam iti tu sākṣāt prākāśyamānaṃ bhagavatā,
1187:1566: taccaivaṃ nirucyate - pudgalanairātmyamātramavaganturmama bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sākṣāt śravaṇabalena yaddhi nairātmyadvayapratipādake'smin dharme prasādasampratyayamātraṃ jātaṃ tannaivāścaryam|
1187:1568: kalpeṣu asmin [ dharme ] dhāraṇādikrameṇa īdṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyamadhigamya paryavāpsyanti te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti|
1187:1572: etena kausīdyaṃ prahāya saddharmagrahaṇādau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamityādarśitam|
1187:1574: pratipattisampadamapi darśayitum api tu khalu punarbhagavan ityavocat|
1187:1580: yadyanātmādikaṃ sat tadā saṃjñāpi tatra niyamena pravartayediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:1583: tasyā api parikṣā'kṣamatvādakiñcanatve sati ātmādyanubhavābhāvādasatyāḥ kā kathā|
1187:1585: nanu cāsattve satyātmādestadviparyayeṇa nātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyata iti kuta ityābhyantarotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vicārya tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityavocat|
1187:1594: tasmāt buddhairbhagavadbhiryathā sarvasaṃjñāpagatatvaṃ śikṣitaṃ tathā bodhisattvairapi śikṣitavyam|
1187:1595: tasmād ye bodhisattvāstasyāmanuśikṣante teṣāmātmādisaṃjñā niyamato na pravartate|
1187:1596: evametat iti vineyānāṃ niścayāpādanārthaṃ svayamabhyupagamya bhagavatā dviruktam|
1187:1599: ataḥ prathamataramanārabdhavīryāṇāṃ teṣām anārabdhavīryatvāpanayanārthaṃ ye sattvāḥ ityādyāha|
1187:1602: mahāyāne tu tadapi dharmamātraṃ mithyeti deśitam,
1187:1603: tasmād anādikālīnasahajātmadṛṣṭisamprayuktāntaḥkaraṇā abhāvitātmānaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ śrutvā nāstyahamiti trasiṣyanti|
1187:1606: yad dharmamātraṃ tasyāpyasattve 'aho ! na mayā bhāvyam' iti matvā daśadigavalokanenāpi śaraṇābhāvāt santrāse tadapākaraṇāya na santrasiṣyanti ityuddiṣṭam|
1187:1607: cintākāle ubhayābhāvayogasyāśakyatvāt santrasiṣyanti ' kathamasmābhirnairātmyadvayamadhigantavyam ' ityādimasantrāsāpasāraṇārthaṃ na santrāsamāpatsyante ityuktam|
1187:1608: anye tāvannairātmyadvayānavabodhād yo hi trāso mṛdu-madhyādhimātrātmakaḥ sa ebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ yathākramamudīrita ityevaṃ manyante,
1187:1610: samprati lābhasatkāreṣu vītarāgatvāt 'te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyantīti|
1187:1611: ' śrotukāmānāṃ hitāya svayaṃ pūrvaṃ praśnamuthyāpya tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityavocat|
1187:1615: na kevalaṃ mayaiveyaṃ paramā paramā proktā,
1187:1616: api tu sarvabuddhairapīyaṃ parametyukteti darśanārthaṃ yāṃ ca paramapāramitāṃ iti nigaditam|
1187:1617: anena 'ekabuiddhena deśitamapi aviparītārthatvena gṛhyate sarvabuddhaikābhipretatve khalu kimucyatām' ityevaṃ dīpitam|
1187:1621: anena paramatvadarśanena hriyaḥ dvitīyaṃ sthānaṃ nirdiśyate,
1187:1623: śreṣṭhastathāpi tvaṃ yallābhasatkārādhyavasitaḥ pramādena sthitastadatīva lajjājanakamityucyate|
1187:1626: evaṃ hrīsthāne deśite'pi ye duḥkhe'kṣāntyā vīryātiśayamārabdhuṃ notsahante,
1187:1627: teṣāṃ duḥkhākṣāntervyapagamārthaṃ trayodaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha apia tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādi|
1187:1635: ataḥ yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā saiva apāramitā ityuktam|
1187:1642: evaṃ paramārthato'nutpannatvāt nāsti tatra pāraṃ gatetyabhisandhiḥ|
1187:1643: anena tasyāḥ kṣānteḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ cāpi darśitam|
1187:1644: evaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhamanasikāreṇa kutaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣāntiriti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:1645: iti jñāpakahetau pṛṣṭe yadā subhūte ityādyattaramāha|
1187:1654: nanu asatyāñca kasyāñcit saṃjñāyāṃ mūrcchāvasthāvad cittābhāvo bhaviṣyatīti cet ?
1187:1655: tatra nāpi asaṃjñā vā babhūva ityāha|
1187:1657: tacca kathamiti cittagataṃ praśnaṃ vikalpya svayaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:1670: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante|| iti||
1187:1672: yena kṣāntibalena kaliṅgarājā eva sattvaḥ narakaṃ gamiṣyatītyabhipretam|
1187:1673: anena kṛtāpakāre'pi sati nirvikāratayā niyataṃ vyāpādādisambhavābhāvatayā ātmādisaṃjñāvyapagamahetutayā ca īdṛśyāḥ kṣānterjñānamādarśitam|
1187:1676: aṅga-pratyaṅga ityanena duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntiḥ me tasmin samaye ityādinā ca dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ|
1187:1677: anena dharmapudgalavikalpayorvipakṣatayā nirdeśena vineyāstatprahāṇe yathoktakṣāntyutpāde samyaggrahaṇe cāvataranti|
1187:1678: tadevam, vineyajanāḥ ' yadā bhagavāneva bodhyarthamevaṃvidhāṃ parāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvitavān,
1187:1687: sā ca kṣāntiḥ dvividhā dīpitānirantaraparāpakāraduḥkhaviṣayikā parāpakārāsahyaduḥkhaviṣayikā ca|
1187:1695: samastenānena asahyaprahāṇāt bodhau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamiti darśitam|
1187:1696: bodhicittotpāde sati na kenāpi saṃsāraduḥkhena spṛṣṭo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ|
1187:1697: bodhicittotpāde'pi ātmābhiniviṣṭatayā trividhaduḥkhasaṃjñābhiḥ santrasya kadācit punarnotpādaḥ syādataḥ sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā ityāha|
1187:1699: rūpādyabhiniveśena śrāvakādivat saṃsāraṃ parikalpya tadduḥkhasantaptāḥ na kadācidapi bodhicittamutpādayanti,
1187:1701: rūpādiṣu satābhiniveśo hi tatra pratiṣṭhita iti pūrvavadatrāpyuktaḥ,
1187:1707: na kvacit pratiṣṭhitam ityanena rūpādiṣu nāmamātrasattābhiniveśaḥ pratiṣidhyate,
1187:1710: yaduta asatāṃ vitathābhiniveśasya prahāṇārthaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate ?
1187:1711: iti cittotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:1714: atrāyamarthaḥ - anādikālastaccitaṃ rūpādiṣu bhāvābhiniveśabalena rūpādau pratiṣṭhitam,
1187:1716: sa tasya rūpādivastuno'bhāvāt paramārthato na pratiṣṭhitaḥ|
1187:1717: tasmādeva ityanenopasaṃhāreṇātra dvitīye pakṣe pratisṭhitatvameva darśitaṃ bhavati|
1187:1719: dvitīyāsahyavastuna pratipakṣatvena api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha|
1187:1721: te'pi sattvā yadi paramārthato na syuḥ,
1187:1723: kathaṃ te tathāvidheṣu mithyāpravṛtteṣu sattveṣu khinnā bhaveyuḥ ityādarśitam|
1187:1724: tatra sattvaṃ saṃjñāṃ ca pratiṣidhya nairātmyadvayamudīritam|
1187:1727: evaṃ tāvad yuktyā kṣāntiryujyata iti nirdiśya sāmprataṃ tathāgate sampratyayo'pi yujyata iti nirūpayan bhūtavādī ityādyāha|
1187:1734: yathā'nye buddhā bhagavantaḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇāni prahīṇavantastathaiva tathāgato'pyayaṃ gataḥ prāptaḥ,
1187:1738: tathāgata evāyamiti kathaṃ sidhyatītyāha- satyavādī iti|
1187:1742: atyantaparokṣārthastu sarvathā samyak kathayituṃ na śakyate, yathoktam-
1187:1744: ayaṃ satyavādī satyaṃ kena rūpeṇa jānātityāha- tathāvādī iti|
1187:1746: sa heyopādeyatattvaṃ sopāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ tathaiva bhāṣate'taḥ sa kathaṃ na satyavādī syāditi|
1187:1747: evaṃbhūte'pi taddeśitāni catvāri satyāni kiṃ tathaiva pratiṣṭhitānīti ?
1187:1750: na pramāṇabādhitāni uktānyataḥ satyānītyarthaḥ etena samagreṇa kāryakāraṇena bhagavataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitam|
1187:1753: ekasyāpi bhāvasvabhāvasya paramārthato'siddhatvād ekamapi satyaṃ tāvad duḥsādhyam,
1187:1755: evaṃ bhagavatā ' māyopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ ' ityukte sati kathaṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhasatyasvabhāvatvam,
1187:1759: nirodhasya tvabhāvāt tatprāpako mārgo'pi naiva paramārthataḥ,
1187:1761: tathoktam- 'bodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya ekasyāpi satyasya siddhirna dṛṣṭā,
1187:1764: etat pravicintya ye bhūtavādini śabdaśo'bhiniviṣṭāsteṣāmadhyāropāntaparihārārtham api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha|
1187:1765: na tatra satyam iti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi svabhāvasyāsiddheḥ|
1187:1766: na mṛṣā ityatra satyavyavacchedena sthitatvāt tadvyavacchedyatvābhāvād yena mṛṣāatvaṃ bhavet tanmṛṣā|
1187:1767: atha vā na satyam iti yathā māyopamā mṛṣā jñānarūpāḥ|
1187:1769: anena tāvad antadvayapratiṣedhena madhyamā pratipad eva nirdiśyate|
1187:1774: tayoḥ ko viśeṣa iti yaccintanaṃ tat tṛtīyasyāsahyavastunaḥ pratipakṣatvenāha tadyathāpi nāma ityādi|
1187:1778: satorapi cakṣuṣoḥ vastvarthānupalambhena heyopādeyārthānabhijñatayā viparyastārtheṣu samastaduḥkhasthāneṣu patito bhavati|
1187:1782: kāyādivastvanupalabhya tadanarthī bhūtvā dānaṃ dadāti tattu yathāpi nāma cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ nānāvidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet dṛṣṭvā ca heyasya hānam upādeyasya copādānamiva|
1187:1785: sūrye'bhyudgate'pi andhakārapūrṇeṣu gṛhādiṣu na paśyatīti matvā''ha prabhātāyām iti|
1187:1788: sa kadācidapi na paśyatītyāśaṅkāyāṃ cakṣuṣmān ityāha|
1187:1790: saḥ avidyātāmisraprabodhena jñānasūryābhyudgamena ca nānāvidhāni jñeyāni yathāvat sampaśyati,
1187:1791: viparyastavastūni samastaduḥkhasthānāni heyaduḥkhāni cāpi mṛṣātvāt parivarjayati,
1187:1793: tasmād bodhisattvā mahābhogasampadanuprāpya anuttarasukhena kāyaṃ sthirīkṛtya bodheravinivṛttā bhavantītyabhiprāyaḥ,
1187:1801: anena prakāreṇa kṣāntipravṛtā api ye dhyānasamāsvādayantastatraivāsaktā jñānasambhārapāripūraye hetubhūtaṃ mahāyānadharmamanārabdhāsteṣāṃ jñānasambhāraviyogaparihārārthaṃ caturdaśasthānamadhikṛtya api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha|
1187:1802: sthānenānena dhyānarasāsvādāpagamāya pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ saddharmaṃ prati vīryārthaṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ paridīpitaḥ, (yathā)
1187:1808: tatra tathāgatānubhāvastu jñātāste tathāgatena ityādi yadāha|
1187:1810: bhagavān hi sarvaṃ vijānātīti sarvajñaḥ draṣṭā ca|
1187:1811: tatra kiṃ mahad āścaryaṃ teṣvityanveṣaṇāyāṃ puṇyasañcayavaiśiṣṭyamādarśayitumāha sarve te sattvāḥ iti|
1187:1812: aprameyapuṇyaskandhānāṃ prasavanād jñātāste bhāgyavanta iti vākyaśeṣaḥ|
1187:1815: aparimito bhavatīti vicintya viśiṣṭapuṇyasaṃgrahaṃ darśayan paśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ! strī vā puruṣo vā ityādyāha|

1187:2681: tadayamāśayaḥ- tattatsūtreṣu bhagavatā 'bodhisattvaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ parigṛhṇāti ' ityuktam|
1187:2682: atra na parigrahītavyaḥ iti vacanena kathaṃ na virodha iti ?
1187:2683: bhagavānapi yenābhiprāyeṇoktavān tadubhayamapi darśayitumāha- parigrahītavyaḥ iti|
1187:2684: parigrahīta iti yadāha tattu parigrahalakṣaṇanaya upasaṃhāralakṣaṇaḥ|
1187:2688: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prārabhya audāryamuktam,
1187:2690: etena sakalena sthānena śāśvatocchedāntaṃ parihṛtya madhyamamārgo deśitaḥ,
1187:2700: tadā bhagavataścaturīryāpathena janmābhiniṣkramaṇādinā cāgamaprasiddhena kathaṃ na virodha iti yo manyate tadarthaṃ prasthānasampada īryāpathena prasthitimadhikṛtya api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścid ityādyāha|
1187:2701: gacchati vā āgacchati vā ityetaddvayena caṅkramaṇam,
1187:2704: bhagavata āgamena paridīpitānāmīryāpathādīnāṃ yaḥ samyaktayā śabdaśo'bhiniveśastāsya viparītābhiniveśānna jānāti tathāgatena bhāṣitasyārtham|
1187:2712: tasmād evaṃvidhāyāṃ īryāpathaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti sandarśitam|
1187:2714: kathaṃ tathāgataḥ iti gatyā prabhāvita ivocyata iti cittāśayaṃ vitarkyāha- tatkasya hetoḥ ? iti|
1187:2715: na me sa bhāṣitasyārthamājānāti ityanena yojanīyam|
1187:2718: api tu adhigamena prabhāvitaḥ gataḥ ityasyādhigatyarthatvāt|
1187:2725: tacca gamanādi kvacit saṃvṛtāvapi na sambhavati,
1187:2729: tataḥ sa vastusvabhāvādhigatyā samastalokasya jyeṣṭhatvāt pūjanīyatvāt arhan ityucyate,
1187:2731: anyathātvena jaḍasvabhāvena rūpakāyastu tathā nocyata iti bhāvaḥ|
1187:2734: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya nirmāṇakāyamāśritya anantalokadhātuṣu apratihatagamanādipradarśanena ādāryamapi pradarśitam|
1187:2738: tasyāpi ekānekasvabhāvavisaṃyogānmāyānirmitabuddhavat mṛṣātvaṃ darśayituṃ bhājanasattvalokabhāvavigamāt prasthitimadhikṛtya yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha|
1187:2742: tadyathāpi nāma maṣiṃ kuryāt....... paramāṇusañcayaḥ ityanena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogāvagamena tanukaraṇopāyo darśitaḥ|
1187:2748: saced bhagavan iti vijñaya ekatvagrāhakanivṛttyupāyārthameva paramāṇuprabhedena (yaḥ)
1187:2749: sañcayaḥ sa ukto na tu paramārthato'navasthitatvāt,
1187:2751: tasmāt na bhagavānavakṣyat paramāṇusañcaya iti abhāṣite'pyevamākhyātatvāt|
1187:2752: anena tathāgatasya rūpābhāvatvena tādṛśyāṃ sthitau chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam|
1187:2754: api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet ?
1187:2755: iti kasmād bhagavānavakṣyadityāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityāha|
1187:2756: asañcayaḥ saḥ iti pūrvottarādidigbhāgabhedena avasthitānāṃ teṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ svabhāvenāsiddhatvānna yujyate tattvataḥ sañcayaḥ|
1187:2758: asati ca digbhāgabhede paramāṇavaḥ paramāṇvantaraiḥ pūrvāparordhvādhodigbhāgabhedena parivṛtā na syuḥ,
1187:2760: bhāga eva bhavati paramāṇurityapi kathanaṃ na yujyate,
1187:2763: aniṣṭhitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ svabhāvena tarhi tvayā kiṃ sādhyate ?
1187:2769: ye paramāṇavastvayā niravayavatvena vyavasthāpyante teṣāṃ pūrvottarādidigbhedābhyupetatvāt digbhāgabhedenābhyupagamyante,
1187:2776: na rūpe naiva netre ca tayormadhye'pi na sthitaḥ|
1187:2777: yatra sthito bhavettatra na sannaiva hi cāpyasat||
1187:2780: bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet ityanenaudāryaṃ cābhihitam,
1187:2783: samprati sattvalokābhāvaprasthitimadhikṛtya bhāṣitastrisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiti saḥ ityādyāha|
1187:2786: ata eva adhātuḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ iti pañcaskandhātmakaḥ sa sattvaloko'pyekānekasvabhāvavirahitaḥ pūrvavaduktaḥ|
1187:2787: anena tathāgatasya tathāvidhāyāṃ sattvalokābhāvaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam|
1187:2788: nirābhāsena tu yogasamāpattiriyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyetyapi sandarśitam|
1187:2789: idānīṃ cittaṃ kathaṃ pragrahītavyamiti darśayituṃ tatkasya hetoḥ ?
1187:2793: yadi sattvaloko yathāprasiddhastathā paramārthataḥ syāt sthūlaikasvabhāvastadā tathāgatena yathāsthiti vastutattvamadhigatamiti sa eva piṇḍagrāhaḥ syāt|
1187:2795: sa eva ca tathāgatasya piṇḍagrāho'tigāḍhataraḥ syāt,
1187:2797: na tvevam, ata evānyatra yo bālajanebhyaḥ piṇḍagrāha ātmagrāhasya hetutvena bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ sa paramārthato'grāhya eva|
1187:2803: vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti paramārthe'bhāvāt sa dharmastvanabhilāpya ityuktavān|
1187:2804: yadyevaṃ grāhyaḥ piṇḍo na syāt tadā tatra grāhakasyāpyabhāvāt kathaṃ vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti vicintyāha - sa ca bālapṛthajanairudgṛhīta ḥ iti|
1187:2809: anyathā yathāvastu vyavahāraprajñaptau kathaṃ te bālāḥ syuḥ ?
1187:2812: anena yadā sarve bhāvāḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvaśūnyāstadā rūpakāyaḥ jñānakāyaśca kathaṃ bhavet paramārthataḥ sasvabhāvaḥ ,
1187:2814: samprati yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādinā sarvasthāneṣu yogasamāpatteḥ kenopāyena sarvatra samādheyamiti tat pradarśyate|
1187:2815: evamanusandhiḥ - yadi nāsti piṇḍagrāhastadā tanmūlaprabhavāyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭerevābhāvāt kathaṃ bhagavān pañcasu dṛṣṭiṣu satkāyadṛṣṭimāheti tadarthaṃ yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādyāha|
1187:2822: tatra yo hi kaścit subhūte ityārabhya tenocyate ātmadṛṣṭiḥ etatparyantamanena kathamavikalpyaṃ taduddiṣṭam|
1187:2825: bhagavatā tu pudgalanairātmyapratipādanādātmaniṣedhārthamāha ātmadṛṣṭiḥ iti tasyāḥ ātmadṛṣṭernirākaraṇena dharmanairātmyaṃ vyavasthāpyate adṛṣṭiḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityuktam|
1187:2829: evaṃ hi subhūtea bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena ityanena yo'vikalpakaḥ sa paridīpyate|
1187:2831: jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ ityanena yenāvikalpyaṃ tadabhihitam|
1187:2842: yathā na pratyupasthāmahe ityanena yo'vikalpastaṃ darśayati|
1187:2843: asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityatra hetuḥ parikīrtitaḥ|
1187:2847: tasyā mithyārthādhigamāvasthāyāṃ kathaṃ na syādavikalpa ityabhiprāyaḥ|
1187:2853: tatra yadi nāsti dharmasaṃjñā tadā tathāgatasya sattvebhyo taddharmadeśanāsaṃjñāsamutpāde kathaṃ na bhavet saṃkleśaḥ ?
1187:2854: kṛpayā sattvārthaṃ yāvatsaṃsārāvasthāne sati dharmasaṃjñayā kathaṃ na syāt saṃkleśaḥ ?
1187:2855: iti vicintya tayaiva cittasampadā deśanā'saṃkleśaṃ gāthayā ca saṃsārākleśamāvedayitum yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha|
1187:2863: anena yamānmahārtho'yaṃ dharmastasmādbodhisattvenaivaṃvidhāyāṃ mahārthadharmadeśanāyāmavaśyameva chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyaṃ tatparidīpitam|
1187:2864: bhāṣyamāṇāyāmapi kathaṃ na syātsaṃkleśa ityetaddarśayituṃ kathaṃ na samprakāśayet ityāha|
1187:2867: evamuktam - yathā vineyajanāstathā sarve dharmā ādito'nutpannatvādanabhilāpyāḥ tasmānna te kenāpi vyapadeśyā ityevaṃ darśyata iti|
1187:2871: ata eva tathāgato dharmadeśanākāle viśuddhalokajñāne prasthitaḥ,
1187:2877: sāmprataṃ nikhilaprajñāpāramitākāyaṃ vyavasthāpya gāthayā saṃsārāsaṃkleśo deśyate|
1187:2883: tatra pañcaskandhātmakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yathāpratīti pratītyasamutpādastāvad hetupratyayasaṃgṛhitatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ ityucyate|
1187:2884: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ tārakāḥ iva draṣṭavyaḥ|
1187:2887: tathaiva saṃskṛtā api avidyājñānāndhakāre sati pratibhāsante,
1187:2891: vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ ca karmavartikaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehaṃ cāśritya prajvalanād dāpa iva draṣṭavyam,
1187:2900: yā kācid vedanā seha duḥkhamiti bhāṣitatvāt|
1187:2901: trividhaiḥ dukhaiḥ sarvā vedanā duḥkhā veditavyā|
1187:2919: tatra ye tāvadatītāste smṛtimātrāvasthitā ato niḥsvabhāvatvena,
1187:2922: pratyupannā vidyudaupamyena ekānekasvabhāvarahitāḥ agrāhyasvabhāvatvaditi tenānvitā vyapadiṣṭāḥ|
1187:2924: abhraupamyena ākāśasamacitte tadbījadauṣṭhulyena janitatvāditi nairātmyadvayaṃ tāvaddeśitam|
1187:2925: ato'nena khalu samagreṇātra bodhisattvaiḥ sadā sarvasaṃskṛtasvabhāvamevaṃ vicārya chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti paridīpitam|
1187:2928: gāthāyāmasyāṃ tāvadidaṃ paridīpyate- saṃkleśamulaṃ tāvad viparyāsaḥ|
1187:2929: ataḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāveṣvanekaśaḥ kenacid vicārayatā manasikurvatā apyevaṃ saṃskāraparijñānādyadā viparyāsābhāvāt na bhavati saṃkleśaṃ (tadā)
1187:2939: kartuṃ loke sukhaṃ śāntau bhave cāpyanadhiṣṭhitaḥ|
1187:2941: traiyadhvikānāṃ jananī munīnāṃ khyātā yathāśakti mayā tato jagat|
1187:2942: vipulena puṇyena viyatsamena vidhūya cāndhyaṃ sugatatvamāpnuyāt||
1187:2943: ācāryakamalaśīlena mādhyamikanayena viracitā vistṛtā āryavajracchedikāṭīkā parisamāptā|
1187:2944: aṣṭamyāṃ śatābdyāṃ bhāratīyācārya mañjuśrīmitreṇa bhota-locāvā yeśe-demahābhāgena ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāmanūditā|
1187:2945: viduṣāṃ vaśaṃvadena ācāryapemātenajinamahādayena bhoṭabhāṣātaḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣāyāṃ punaruddhṛtā sarvasattvahitasukhārtham iti|
